messages.title: THE LIB DEMS ARE WINNING
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May. Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader. MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems, fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Build a stronger and fairer country where goodwill and effort are rewarded, and public services work efficiently and offer support to those who need it most.

The Liberal Democrats are leading the fight to save our planet by calling for 80% of the UK's electricity to be generated from renewables by 2030, and for 40% of UK land to be covered with trees over the next decade.
EU citizens need accessible healthcare, proper funding for our schools, and a fair social care system.

issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats are leading the fight to save our planet by calling for 80% of the UK's electricity to be generated from renewables by 2030, and for 40% of UK land to be covered with trees over the next decade.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RTYB-HABT-UBUU, South Yorkshire Liberal Democrats, Omega Court, 360 Cemetery Road, Sheffield, S11 8FT
